summary: Suhas S recently upgraded to the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra and finds it to be an absolute powerhouse with its Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, stunning 200MP camera, long-lasting battery, and S-Pen support. However, the size and weight make it uncomfortable for one-handed use, there is bloatware in Samsung's One UI, and the price is on the higher side at $1,300.
pros: Insanely powerful processor (great for gaming and productivity)
Stunning 200MP camera with incredible zoom capabilities
Long battery life with fast charging
S-Pen support is unique and useful
cons: Size and weight make it uncomfortable for one-handed use
Samsung's One UI comes with bloatware
name: Suhas S
